jobdescription: Job Description for Member Technical - Wire Harness  Fabrication Position Introduction: Rossell Techsys is the Aerospace and Defence (AD) Division of Rossell India Limited (www.rossellindia.com). Rossell Techsys is based out of the technology hub of India - Bangalore.Rossell Techsys employs a little under 100 staff members and has aggressive growth plans to meet the emerging challenges of the Indian Aerospace and Defence Industry, including potential offset business in India. Rossell Techsys has four core competency areas - Custom embedded systems product development, Test solution design and development including test jigs, rigs, and simulators, Wire harness engineering  looming and Product Support Services. Rossell Techsys is AS9100 Rev C and IS0 9001, 14001(EMS), 27001(ISMS) certified organisation. Rossell Techsys is a CEMILAC approved design house. Positions: This position is for Member - Staff level as an individual contributor with 2 to 10 years of experience. Qualifications and Credentials: Candidates must be at least Diploma in Electronics and Electrical,with excellent academic credentials, from premier educational institutes. Given the kind of vision that Rossell TechSys has set for itself, candidates must not only be worthy professionals, but fundamentally, mature in all aspects of their personality, be able to work in an invigorating, team oriented, and global engineering environment. A belief of 'competing with one's own self' would be good to start with. Candidates with prior experience in aviation and defense domain would be given preference. Candidate who satisfies at least a part of the technical requirements and most of the personality requirements would be exciting candidates to meet with. Technical Requirements: Mandatory / Primary Skills Hands on experience in wiring harness fabrication with knowledge in various cable finishing tools and techniques such as crimp, solder, splicing, potting, sleeving, printing, Connectorisation, etc Knowledge of wire harness components and manufacturing process used in the cable industry is a must. Experience in Aircraft Looms and RF cables will be a plus. Knowledge on Wire Harness In process Inspection stages IPC/WHMA-620 A trained candidate will be a huge plus. Must have worked in an ISO 9001-2008 QMS environment. Experience with AS9100B will be a huge plus. As at this time, we are not working in shifts, however, over time, this position entails working in shifts. Secondary Skills Domain skills in the Aviation and Defense sector. Mechanical CAD design experience will be a huge plus. A fearless attitude to engineering related work. Yet having the good use of common sense and knowing when to take the risk and when not to. Personality Requirements: Candidate must have good communication skills Must have a positive attitude and display maturity in understanding that organizational goals and objectives take precedence to individual goals and objectives. Compensation: Selected Candidates shall be offered benchmark compensation packages and rewards for high performance. Joining Time: Selected Candidates are expected to join within 2 to 4 weeks. References: Selected Candidates will be required to provide a minimum of 2 references on employment. user: job description for the position of business development manager
jobdescription: LimeTray is a product-start-up helping restaurants market, engage and sell to more customers online. 6 out of 10 restaurants shut down in less than a year of starting up  this is not because they serve bad food or are expensive but because they fail to reach out to enough customers to cover costs. With its data driven products and services, LimeTray makes it easier for such restaurants to tap the customer base that now lives online. LimeTray has been one of the fastest growing start-ups in India, and is present Pan India in cities like Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Chandigarh, Jaipur and other cities; in the period of only 2 years and 6 months; with around 250 employees all over India. Our founding team consists of ISB, NSIT alumni with strong-domain knowledge having built one of the largest online food ordering portal before and we count very successful internet entrepreneurs as our angel investors  advisors. We are also backed by Matrix Partners, one of the top 5 VC firms in India. When you work with us, you work with a peer group that comprises of people who have previously worked at companies like McKinsey  Company, JP Morgan, Bain  Company, Zomato, FoodPanda and Rocket Internet We manage a 1200 clientele which includes Big Brands like Burger King, Subway, Brekkie, MK Dabbawala, Krispe Kreme, Tummy Kart, Leopold Cafe, Kaati Zone, Rolls on Wheels, Bhukkad, Beijing Bites, The Chocolate Room, Calvins, Khan Saheb, Night Panda, Tikki TIkki, and many more. We at LimeTray believe in the power of Hustle, Hunger and Ambition. We are excited to face new challenges to further explore our potential and think beyond. Everyone in the team hence has a very high sense of ownership  is given a lot of responsibilities. So, now we are looking for energetic, self motivated and passionate people who can join us quick and get the magic started Responsibilities - Personally contact and secure new business accounts/orders through a relationship-based approach. - Demonstrate products and services to existing and potential customers and assist them in selecting those best suited to their needs. - Achieve maximum sales profitability, growth and account penetration within an assigned Territory and/or market segment by effectively selling the company's products and services. Skill Set - We're looking for people who enjoy selling - Courageous, competitive and hungry folk who like to go out, meet people  are able to strike conversations easily - Confidence, diligence and the ability to persevere are key skills - Excellent Communication skills What we offer - Competitive Compensation package - Challenging career path with huge growth opportunities across functions and geographies for high performers - A workplace where you can create a huge impact Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: FMCG / Foods / Beverage Functional Area: Sales , Retail , Business Development Role Category:Retail Sales Role:Sales/Business Development Manager Keyskills Business Development Management Sales Selling Profitability New Business Communication Skills Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate, MBA/PGDM - Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: Premium LimeTray is a product-startup helping restaurants market, engage and sell to more customers online. 6 out of 10 restaurants shut down in less than an year of starting up  this is not because they serve bad food or are expensive but because they fail to reach out to enough customers to cover costs. user: job description for the position of devops engineer
jobdescription: Role purpose : The 1FBSSPL DevOps Engineer (DOE) will manage and maintain software development systems, java-based application servers, and apache web servers. Reports to: Senior General Manager (IT Head - India) Working Hours: 2:00pm 11:00pm Reported by: Nil (Individual Contributor Role) Job Overview : The 1FBSSPL DevOps Engineer (DOE) will manage and maintain software development systems, java-based application servers, and apache web servers. The DevOps Engineer will assist in the design of robust java-based application architectures that use Weblogic, TIBCO BusinessWorks, F5 network devices, and apache web servers. The DOE will work to improve the operation and reliability of software development systems and application servers through automated monitoring and automation of common tasks. Essential Functions and Responsibilities : Build new software development systems and upgrade and patch existing systems. Act as liaison between software development groups and the Operations group to resolve issues with system configuration and behavior. Configure, patch, and maintain Linux-based application servers and other development servers. Work closely with U.S. based software development teams and Operations personnel to insure development environments are correctly configured. Be quick to recognize tasks which can be automated and then automate them to reduce manual effort and improve repeatability. Conduct performance and fault analysis on applications with the assistance of software developers. Deploy web applications in a clustered and load balanced N-Tier infrastructure Write and maintain documentation involving job related functions. Job Requirements : Minimum 5 years of total relevant experience. Three years of experience in a previous DevOps role working with UNIX/linux servers and with java applications on Weblogic application servers. Experience writing complex shell scripts. Weblogic Java Application Server administration and tuning experience. Expert level understanding of networking/distributed computing concepts and client/server applications Linux administration experience (e.g. Ubuntu, RedHat/CentOS) with a focus on web (Apache) and Ansible would be a plus. Experience with Nagios, writing Nagios Scripts Understanding of protocols and technologies like HTTP, SSL, LDAP, JDBC, Servlet/JSP, HTML, XML Understand application clustering/load balancing concepts and technologies Excellent verbal and written communications skills in English are required. Ability to handle change and a self-starting attitude are required. Ability to work independently and also coordinate with others and to prioritize projects as well as combining research and expertise to assist organization. A passion for providing excellent service Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming  Design Role:Release Manager Keyskills Ansible Unix Python Scripting continuous integration build and deployment build and release and deployment Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Company Profile: IFB Support Services Pvt. The Company is engaged in the business of providing information technology management services, risk management services and contact centre based customer support and collection services to its parent 1st Financial Bank USA (1FBUSA). 1FBUSA is an FDIC-insured, state-chartered bank headquartered in Dakota Dunes, South Dakota, founded in 1910. It has multiple subsidiary operations in various locations across the United States. The bank is a leading provider of financial services to college students and graduates from coast to coast, and is committed to providing quality community banking services in South Dakota. 1FBSSPL offers you the opportunity to learn the credit card business, work with the latest technology, build new applications and systems, interact with US colleagues and have a direct impact on business outcomes in a collegial, family atmosphere and state-of-the-art work environment. Job description : Defect Reduction team, you will lead a team of Program managers and analysts responsible for shaping the strategy and direction of customer-facing products that are core to the customer experience. You will bring innovation, a strategic perspective, a passionate voice, and an ability to prioritize and execute on a fast-moving set of priorities, competitive pressures, and operational initiatives. You will partner closely with product and technology teams to define and build innovative and delightful experiences for customers. You must be highly analytical, able to work extremely effectively in a matrix organization, and have the ability to break complex problems down into steps that drive product development at speed. You will set the tempo for defect reduction through continuous improvement and drive accountability across multiple business units in order to deliver large scale high visibility/ high impact projects. You will lead by example to be just as passionate about operational performance and predictability as you will be about all other aspects of customer experience Responsibilities : Drive effective teamwork, communication, collaboration and commitment across multiple disparate groups with competing priorities. Effectively manage customer expectations and resolve conflicts that balance client and company needs. Drive team to manage large programs, dependencies and bottlenecks, provide escalation management, anticipate and make trade-offs, balance the business needs versus technical constraints. Develop process to effectively maintain and disseminate project information to stakeholders. Be successful in a delivery focused environment and determining the right processes to make the team successful. Possess superior analytical abilities and judgment. Use quantitative and qualitative data to prioritize and influence, show creativity, experimentation and innovation, and drive projects with urgency in this fast-paced environment. Build and manage a very strong team of program managers and analysts who use data and metrics to drive decision-making and innovate on behalf of the customer. Partner with key stakeholders to develop the vision and strategy for customer experience on our platforms. Influence product roadmaps based on this strategy along with your teams. This leader will lead the organization through change, evolution, and sustained growth. The right leader will evolve and scale the organization along with the business. jobdescription: CE Mission Statement : To build India's most loved fashion brand by offering differentiated customer experience. Relevance : - Customer experience has been acknowledged as the core driver of Myntra's growth and more so going forward as we become an engagement platform rather than just a fashion retailer. user: job description for the position of controller
jobdescription: Basic Function:â€¯The controller position is responsible for the accounting operations of the firm, including the production of periodic financial reports, maintenance of an adequate system of accounting records, and a comprehensive set of controls and budgets designed to mitigate risk, enhance the accuracy of the firm's reported financial results, and ensure that reported results comply with generally accepted accounting principles or international financial reporting standards. Management 1. Maintain a documented system of accounting policies and procedures 2. Manage outsourced functions 3. Oversee the operations of the accounting department, including the design of an organizational structure adequate for achieving the department's goals and objectives Transactions 1. Ensure that accounts payable are paid in a timely manner and based on internal analysis to establish appropriate priorities 2. Ensure that all reasonable discounts are taken on accounts payable 3. Ensure that accounts receivable are collected promptly 4. Ensure that payroll is processed in a timely manner 5. Ensure that periodic bank reconciliations are completed 6. Ensure that required debt payments are made on a timely basis 7. Maintain the chart of accounts 8. Maintain an orderly accounting filing system 9. Maintain a system of controls over accounting transactions Reporting 1. Issue timely and complete financial statements 2. Coordinate the preparation of the corporate annual report 3. Recommend benchmarks against which to measure the performance of company operations 4. Calculate and issue financial and operating metrics 5. Manage the production of the annual budget and forecasts 6. Calculate variances from the budget and report significant issues to management 7. Provide for a system of management cost reports 8. Provide financial analyses as needed, in particular for capital investments, pricing decisions, and contract negotiations Compliance 1. user: job description for the position of machine learning nlp expert candidates from premier institutes only
jobdescription: Overview: As we continue to expand our artificial intelligence platform, Amelia, we are looking for NLP experts to join our development team. We need great scientists who also are great coders. Our scientists tackle the big challenges in deep language understanding and are passionate about writing sustainable code to implement advanced ideas. Whether from published research or their own approaches, our scientists identify and integrate the best science available all to create the best new NLP capability possible. We are looking for a hands-on scientist and developer ready to tackle the big challenges in deep language understanding. With an extensive existing customer base and a market-leading position in help desk automation, your work will go into production as soon as it shows measurable improvement over current methods. We think long term, while putting our research into practice on a rational schedule. Responsibilities: The ideal candidate will have both a research and development background. Having a history of peer-reviewed scientific publications in NLP is a plus. We have interest in candidates with a machine learning background and approach to NLP. We are also interested in candidates with a rule-based NLP background and knowledge of linguistic semantics. We have interest in candidates with experience in many portions of the NLP pipeline, including parsing, word sense disambiguation, knowledge extraction, question answering and language generation. Open source development experience is a plus. Ability to code in Java is required. You will lead an area of development of the pipeline, guiding and mentoring junior developers, working with the leads of the other areas of the pipeline and the lead scientist to create and deploy new capabilities in language understanding. You should be passionate about writing good and sustainable code to implement your advanced ideas. You will be expected to identify and integrate the best science available, whether from published research or your own approach. You will work with test and analysis engineers to prove your ideas against objective and measurable tests of capability. Each day you will be expected to move as needed between designing scientific approaches and architecture, writing or contributing to scientific publications, mentoring, and development in Java, all in the service of creating the best new NLP capability possible. Good scientists must also be good communicators, able to explain and justify complex ideas to junior developers and senior management, both verbally and in writing. You should be comfortable defining delivery schedules and metrics for performance assessment and meeting your targets. First and foremost we need great scientists who also are great coders. A mature coder should be able to learn a new framework quickly, so experience with each of the items below just helps us understand your implementation experience, but each is desirable. o -Development tools such as Maven, Jenkins, Ant, Eclipse o -Comfortable on Apple or Linux OSes o -Java Spring, Guava, JDBC, Tomcat, JUnit Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Computer Science from IIT/ IISc/ NITs/ Bits/ DCE/ ITBHU/ Guindy / Top US universities 1-3 Years Experience in Machine Learning and NLP Salary:INR 12,00,000 - 22,00,000 P.A Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming  Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills Machine Learning nlp natural language processing Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Computers PG:Post Graduation Not Required, M.Tech - Computers Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: IPsoft Global Services Private Limited About Company ABOUT IPSOFT IPsoft is a global, industry-leading managed services company offering a complete solution to enterprise customers for outsourcing global IT operations. We offer a full range of managed services to our clients, from management at the individual component, device and network level to the analysis, design and management of complex business processes. IPsoft's unique (and proprietary) automation technology remediates more than half of the detected exceptions in our managed client environments. We manage our customers' systems through our worldwide Network Operations Centers located in New York City (HQ), London, Amsterdam and Bangalore. IPsoft has been solidly profitable since its inception as a company in 1998, and has roughly doubled its gross revenues for four straight years; we are on a trajectory to continue this rapid growth pace, meaning that you will have an opportunity to grow with the company. CULTURE IPsoft is committed to helping our employees develop their full potential in both business and technical spheres, and it is our policy to recognize excellent performance by promoting from within. IPsoft is a fast-paced, energetic and fun place to work. We're changing the way managed services are delivered to customers, and we're looking for people who want to make a difference. The best evidence that IPsoft is a good place to work? People come to work here and stay. If you come to work at IPsoft, you'll be working with cutting-edge technologies and the bright, driven people who develop them. Download PPT Photo 1  View Contact Details

Join Apollo Sugar India! Apollo Sugar Clinics is an innovative, single specialty diabetes and endocrine healthcare service provider, formed as a collaboration between Apollo Hospitals Group and Sanofi (Global Pharma MNC). Apollo Sugar believes that human capital is the key to the success of our organization. We have built a culture of collaboration between teams that ensures growth of individuals and the organization. Our work environment drives innovation and passion towards patient service. We recruit  engage the best talent pool towards fulfillment of our core objectives - compassion and care of our patients. With the expertise and knowledge of our international partners, we bring global standards, in the field of single specialty clinics. Apollo Sugar is an equal opportunity employer and promotes diversity in our workforce. If you are compassionate with a flair for service excellence that you think can provide healing touch to improve the lives of people around you, Apollo Sugar is the place for you. Join our team to leverage career opportunities and achieve long term success. Our talent pool comprises of specialists in Medical Services, Marketing, Finance, HR, IT, Operations  Quality domain. In our clinics operation, we endeavor to impart quality experience to our multi-disciplinary care specialists comprising Endocrinologists, Diabetologists, Operations Incharges, Patient Care Facilitators, Diabetes Specialist Nurses, Dieticians, Diabetic Educators, and Sales  Marketing lead's with meaningful assignments to enhance their skills and expertise at par with global standards. To know more about your career options, connect with Apollo Sugar HR Partners and discover how successful you can be with us. More About Apollo Sugar (read more at www.apollosugar.com) India is home to over 65 million diabetics and more than 50 million pre-diabetics. More than 30 million Indians are unknown diabetics (not yet diagnosed but afflicted). The need of the hour is to address this endemic with a dedicated, comprehensive model of care - Apollo Sugar Clinics is the answer. Apollo Sugar (An Apollo Group Company) is an innovative care delivery business focused on providing assured care for Diabetics. With 30 years of the Apollo group's heritage and quality healthcare delivery behind it, Apollo Sugar was founded on the vision to make diabetes disease free. We are building the largest pan-India single specialty clinics model for Diabetes. Our vision is 'disease-free diabetes' and our mission is to provide proven and comprehensive care to the diabetic being cared for, and not just the disorder - to keep co-morbidities or related complications of the heart, kidneys, eyes, nerves, feet at bay. We successfully deliver robust patient outcomes by staffing each Sugar clinic with best in class multi-disciplinary care teams of doctors, dieticians, trained diabetes specific nurses and counselors, backed with proven treatment protocols and lifestyle management interventions to enable our customers to keep their Diabetes in good control and live a disease free lifestyle. We currently have 35 Apollo Sugar clinics that are operational pan India across major cities, and are fast scaling up to our footprint to help provide proven, quality care for millions of more diabetic patients across India. user: job description for the position of product support specialist logistimo
jobdescription: Looking for a job or career at a fast-growing and highly impactful industry to empower people and society? Are you looking for an opportunity to take ownership and drive results? Look no further because Logistimo is the place for you! Logistimo pioneers mobile and web supply chain technology for rural emerging markets across Healthcare, Consumer goods, Agricultural goods, Waste management and Humanitarian action. Customers include agencies of the UN, Ministries of Health of different countries, Public Health Units, Retailers, Distributors, Transporters, Wholesalers and Producers seeking deeper integration of the first- and last-mile of their value chains. From Asia to Africa, at Logistimo, they apply technology to improve supply chain performance, create greater transparency, decrease operating costs and provide clients with a competitive advantage. Based in Bangalore, Logistimo needs a capable and motivated Product Support Specialist to help provide the best support on the Logistimo product for all its users. Key skills required include an ability to manage product issues or requests raised at various levels and integrate them to the product pipeline in coordination with the engineering team. Another key aspect of the role is to provide all levels of customer support to users including prioritizing escalations, new feature launches, creating easy reference guides/FAQ, user issue analysis etc. Helping to derive client insights and drive process transformation, this role presents a unique opportunity to make a tangible difference in rural healthcare, agriculture, disaster response and beyond. Target salary range is highly competitive (7 - 12L CTC) and will be based on previous experience, subject to customary increases on joining. This is not a shift based role; you will be working regular office hours (which will be same as rest of Logistimo team). Detailed Responsibilities: Investigate, diagnose and respond to technical questions and issues received from customers Provide thorough product support across all levels (large technical issues and granular - device related issues) Promptly answer support related emails , phone calls and other communications Log reported bugs to the engineering team via bug reporting platforms Partner with the engineering team to ensure filed bug fixes are completed within the stipulated time frame Support pilot deployments across new regions with new customers; provide direct and ongoing user support; provide onsite training for users; monitor and report support data across multiple metrics Gather, consolidate and present data periodically from the customer request tools to internal stakeholders Design, test and implement improvements in the tools and processes deployed by the customer success team in partnership with multiple stakeholders Create and update the technical support 'FAQ library' periodically, in collaboration with the internal communications team Keep abreast of new features and product enhancements Salary:INR 7,00,000 - 12,00,000 P.A. Based on previous experience, subject to customary increases on joining. Industry: Courier / Transportation / Freight / Warehousing Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Voice Role:Associate/Senior Associate -(Technical) Keyskills Supply chain Product management Product support Customer support technical support helpdesk customer support Team lead Email Support email technical Technical Service Manager L3 FAQ Training SAAS Desired Candidate Profile 2-3 years of relevant work experience in an IT/Product support environment. Experience working in healthcare/development sector/SaaS products would be beneficialPassion for customer success - Going above and beyond to resolve customer issues. Proven ability to promptly answer support related email, phone calls and other communicationsExperience in working with multiple stakeholders- Able to represent the company externally and work with external customers (individual and institutional). Experience in collaborating with internal teams (product, technical, business, etc) to resolve customer issues is a mustExperience in product management - providing product related (technical)support. Ability and interest to learn new technologies / product features and discuss this with technical teams and non-technical customersProblem solving - Ability to think quick and problem solve independently. user: job description for the position of senior software engineer technical lead java
jobdescription: Job Summary : The Technical Lead will perform Java based software design, development and deployment tasks. Work Timings : 11:00am to 8:00pm (3 days in a week) 2:00pm 11:00pm (2 days in a week depending on project needs) Experience : Minimum 6 years Key Areas of Responsibility and Accountability The Technical Lead candidate shall work as an individual contributor (approximately 70 of the time) by doing Analysis, Design Development and Unit Tests. 30 of the time shall be spent in mentoring juniors, design and code reviews and participation in discussions on architectural design and maintenance of systems. The Technical Lead role requires the ability to mentor/ help a small team of software engineers through the development lifecycle, driving successful and timely completion of technical tasks. The successful candidate will have the ability to adjust quickly to shifting priorities and multiple deadlines. Should have the ability to understand, explain and communicate technical concepts. The incumbent must have significant hands-on technical experience in all phases of the software development life cycle of enterprise-wide applications. This includes having the ability to interpret design application architectures, to incorporate best of breed technologies capable of meeting business requirements, to contribute to system performance and to resolve technical issues. Skill and experience requirements  Ability to program in all tiers of a typical J2EE application (Front-end, Business layer and O/R mapping/DAO layer) Write new code and enhance existing code Design code using core design patterns Maintain disciplined software engineering practices in day to day development work Perform functional design review, code reviews  unit tests Perform process reviews to ensure that software engineering processes meet changing business conditions and remain consistent with industry best practices Minimum seven years of industry experience in object-oriented software design and development. Experience with Web Logic or Oracle 10gAS and an excellent understanding of database technologies and persistence techniques. Thorough understanding of technical concepts as they apply to N-tier distributed computing and to end-to-end performance, availability, reliability, security, integration and configurability of software applications. Excellent conceptual understanding and extensive hands-on experience with Java, XML, EJB, JSP, Servlets, JMS/MQ, JDBC, Struts, spring, Hibernate, Ajax and other J2EE technologies. Proficiency with both NT and UNIX environments, including software deployment and execution. Experience in development using TIBCO BusinessWorks integration tool will be advantage. Associated requirements  Establish an environment of learning and growth keeping organizational values and operating policies in mind. Facilitate and support the delivery of excellent quality product releases Review team members implementation to ensure they follow the design and coding guidelines. Work with developers to resolve their technical issues  mentor them. Work with QA to improve test plans. Report work status on technical tasks to program manager. jobdescription: Overview: Datamar India is looking for experienced and skilled Admin, HR  Finance Controller who can coordinate office operations and procedures, in order to ensure organizational effectiveness, efficiency and safety. The ideal candidate will be experienced in handling a wide range of administrative and executive support related tasks and will be able to work independently with little or no supervision. This person must be exceedingly well organized, flexible and enjoy the administrative challenges of supporting an office of diverse people. Datamar India is a data and market intelligence provision company working in the maritime and foreign trade sector with a focus on the East Coast of South America. The company partners with major transport companies such as ship and port operators to gather, process and distribute data that helps organizations make decisions on strategic, commercial and operational matters. Responsibilities: Admin, HR  Finance Controller will be responsible for overseeing the full range of maintaining and enhancing the organizations Administration, Finance and Human Resources by planning, implementing, and evaluating employee relations and human resources policies, programs and practices. Admin, HR  Finance Controller will also be part of the senior management team and will have the opportunity to bring an HR and Administrative perspective to the organisation. Administration: Oversee office in maintaining files and centralized databases Manage office facilities administration Serves as the go-to for office inquiries and conflicts Plan and coordinate administrative procedures and systems and devise ways to streamline processes Manage schedules and deadlines Monitor inventory of office supplies and the purchasing of new material with attention to budgetary constrains Organise and supervise other office activities Human Resources: Be the first point of contact for all HR-related queries Administer HR-related documentation, such as contracts of employment Ensure the relevant HR database is up to date, accurate and complies with legislation Plan, implements, and manages the human resources function, including recruiting, employee relations, regulatory compliances, benefits, staff developments, and employee communications Investigates employee relations issues such as disciplinary and grievances Effectively communicate HR policies, procedures, programs and laws organization wide Finance: Achieves financial objectives by anticipating requirements; submitting information for budget preparation; scheduling expenditures; monitoring costs; analysing variances. Monitor cost and expenses, maintenance activities and tradespersons Responsible for Capital  Expense budget Tracking budget expenses Manage day to day finances, make payments to vendors and service providers. Coordinate with outsourced accountancy service, in regards to payroll management, and other financial matters. user: job description for the position of sow coordinator scalene works
jobdescription: Job Description PRIMARY - Accountable to manage the end to end SOW process between Vendor and Client as being efficiently executed with the purpose of driving timely and accurate tracking which feeds Vendor payable - critical data collection SECONDARY - Provide administrative and client facing support as needed to address outstanding finance / billable issues that stem from SOW timing activities Activities: - Work closely with recruiters and onboarding teams to confirm contractors hired and eligible for specific onboarding and SOW submission - adhere to Client submission requirements and submit SOW request through Client system - track all submissions to ensure they are returned - manage resubmissions with Client directly for inaccuracies - Work with Vendors to ensure alignment of start dates on SOW to align with billing - Work with Vendor billing departments to ensure billing issue and SOW issues are effectively resolved - Work directly with Client SOW team to help in expediting SOW issues - Tracking down any necessary approvals for bill rates on SOW as necessary prior to submission - Manage all end date extensions and end dates - working closely with Account Admin on active headcount status - provide additional onboarding and contractor management support as needed - ensure deadline and timeframes are met - provide administrative support to A/R teams to help manage outstanding receivables with Client finance teams sitting offshore - Co-ordinate with onboarding and finance teams to manage new hires. jobdescription: Inside sales specialist and lead generation Specialist jobs in leading Company. For more info Call or whatsapp at 9611209386 This is an opportunity for you to use your incredible sales skills to move to the head of the pack. You will be working with small to medium size businesses in the U.S in a way that will lead to a closed sale. Your business acumen, research, ability to show Return on Investment and closing skills will win the day. Eligibility Graduates fresher/Experience Undergraduate with Inside sales or telesales Experience for one year Shifts and off : Day /US shift Work location : BTM/Yemulur Salary : up to 10 Lakh (depends upon relevant experience) Company Description Company is part of a leader in connected vehicle technologies, with solutions for fleet management, usage-based insurance and road usage charge programs in use throughout North America, South America, Europe and India. It is one of the fastest growing and most dynamic sales centers in all of Bangalore! Company is blowing away the competition with our leading edge solutions for fleet tracking, and our reps are making a great living doing it. Some of our team members are among the highest paid in Bangalore. What We Offer Be part of one of the best inside sales teams in Bangalore Highly dynamic sales environment where the Bangalore team is outselling the competition that uses inside sales groups in the US. Go India!! Best-in-industry sales compensation that includes not only lucrative fixed and variable components, but also spot bonuses and contests for trips, vacations, cash, and more Top sales reps are pulling in over 40 Lakhs per annum! Medical insurance - company paid Pick-up and drop off transportation to most locations in Bangalore - company paid All meals provided - company paid What we are looking for? We are looking for a talented and competitive Inside Sales Representative that thrives in a quick sales cycle environment. The successful candidate will play a fundamental role in achieving our ambitious customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. You must be comfortable making dozens of calls per day, working with channel partners, generating interest, qualifying prospects and closing sales. What do inside sales executives do? Inside sales are the sale of products or services by sales personnel who reach customers by phone or online, rather than traveling to meet them face-to-face. Inside relies on the phone, emails and the internet to reach customers Responsibilities Source new sales opportunities through inbound lead follow-up and outbound cold calls and emails Understand customer needs and requirements Route qualified opportunities to the appropriate sales executives for further development and closure Close sales and achieve quarterly quotas Research accounts, identify key players and generate interest Maintain and expand your database of prospects within your assigned territory Team with channel partners to build pipeline and close deals Perform effective online demos to prospects Career opportunities in Inside sales There are many reasons why people choose a career in sales. From unlimited income to the autonomy that many sales careers offer, sales careers certainly have a lot to offer. With the Inside Sales industry growing due to an increasing number of employers recognizing the many benefits of employing inside reps, choosing a career in Inside Sales have become a topic of consideration for many job hunters. If you are actively seeking a sales position and have been wondering if you should pursue an Inside Sales position, here are a few factors that may sway you towards considering moving inside. A Dynamic, High-Energy Work Atmosphere High Income and Awards Being able to work from anywhere in the world is not something that all those in the Inside Sales industry can enjoy but those that can often claim this factor as the most appealing thing about their positions. Required Skills Ability to engage and build long term relationship with prospects Clear and concise verbal communication skills appropriate to the U.S and U.K prospects Working knowledge of Salesforce.com and MS Office would be an added advantage Proven ability to identify and develop new sales opportunities. Knowledge of sales and marketing including basic selling principles and solution selling methods; should be able to discover prospects pain points by using probing techniques and effectively address each one of them. Ability to quickly research a prospect company and tailor your presentation to their specific needs and close the sale. Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales quotas A disciplined approach to managing your territories and your sales efforts on a daily basis Passion for Inside sales; successful candidates are self-driven, energetic, confident and motivated with the ability to think on your feet Strong judgment and decision making skills Regards CA Shwetha Recruitment consultant-ITES/BPO IKYA Human capital solutions Bangalore Ikya Human Capital Solutions, A Unit of Quess corp, 2nd floor, Raheja Arcade, Beside Punjab grill, Koramangala, Bangalore Landmark: Opposite to Forum mall, Koramangala Contact details Mob: 9611209386 Email : shwetha.caikyaglobal.com â€ƒ Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: BPO / Call Centre / ITES Functional Area: ITES , BPO , KPO , LPO , Customer Service , Operations Role Category:Voice Role:Associate/Senior Associate -(NonTechnical) Keyskills Marketing Inside Sales Solution Selling Lead Generation Telesales Cold Calling Outbound Inbound Customer Acquisition Telematics selling Product Software sales outbound calls cold call pre sales post sales cross selling Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Company Profile: Ikya Human Capital Solutions Pvt Ltd IKYA Download PPT Photo 1  View Contact Details

jobdescription: Greeting from R2R Consultants!!! We have excellent opportunity with an leading Health care Industry.. MD Pharmacology Freshers only Apply Job Location- Kolkota/Bangalore Job Designation- Scientific project manager Job Description. Participate in set up, oversight and follow-up of assigned clinical studies/medical projects, ensuring that the studies are carried out in accordance with all relevant processes and procedures Assist relationships and advance the scientific credibility of the Company with established and emerging Regional/National Opinion Leaders (OL). Respond to requests for scientific/medical information and provide key scientific information updates to Regional and National OLs, as appropriate. Develop/maintain key scientific knowledge that enable credible dissemination of scientific information, informed scientific dialogue with physicians/OLs and development of professional working relationships Ensure compliance with all applicable national laws  regulations, guidelines, codes of conduct, Abbotts policies  procedures, and accepted standards of best practice PRIMARY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES - EXAMPLES KEY CUSTOMERS Provide scientific and technical support for, and help maintain professional and credible relationships with, key OLs/ academic centres to ensure access to current medical/scientific information on the products/areas of therapeutic interest. Assist in initiation, oversight and follow up of assigned clinical studies/medical projects initiated within the relevant TA (e.g. post marketing clinical activities such as registry/database projects, epidemiological surveys, post-authorization studies (phase IV), IIS projects, etc.). Note: all activities to comply with applicable local laws, guidelines, codes of practice, SOPs, and GPRD SOPs. Maintain contacts with physicians and OLs of the assigned geographic area in order to satisfy their needs for scientific knowledge in the therapeutic area and, where requested, Abbott drugs/products the SPM carries responsibility for. Deliver credible presentations on scientific matters to physicians, individually or in groups (meetings, clinical sessions, etc.), where requested. Internal Clinical Research Manager Clinical Operations Manager Medical Advisers/Managers Marketing department of the therapeutic area Sales organization of the geographic area of responsibility. Administrative personnel of the Medical Department and of the Business Unit. Pharmacovigilance Unit of the Affiliate. Medical Information Service. IMD/GPT/GSS/MBO Personnel Participate in the selection process to identify appropriately qualified physicians the Company would wish to engage in collaborative efforts such as potential research collaborations, or lecture/meeting support (Round Tables, Congresses, Symposia, etc.); and to ensure a high level of scientific or educational integrity in these collaborative efforts. Develop awareness and understanding of competitor issues/intelligence for example, product strategies, studies, commercial messages, positioning, etc and communicate, where appropriate, within the Company. External Healthcare personnel of the medical area in which the SPM performs his or her functions (physicians, nurses, pharmacists) Participating Research Investigators Opinion leaders Institutions and Scientific or Medical Societies Attend relevant Scientific Societies meetings/Conferences, and develop summaries of key messages for use within the Company such as key areas of scientific/company interest, new trends in diagnosis, monitoring  treatments in the TA, etc. AUTHORITY / REPORTING LINES LOCATION Upon request, assist physicians appropriately direct requests for access to Company products on a named patient or compassionate use basis, subject to all applicable legal and regulatory requirements Support sales/marketing/internal team areas to develop their scientific and technical expertise through the delivery of scientific update presentations. Provide KOLs  internal medical/clinical teams with scientific/technical support for publications of scientific/ medical interest. Ensure up to date knowledge of products uses and external data. Perform administrative duties in a timely manner as assigned. Reports to a Medical Manager (or equivalent) of an assigned Therapeutic Area Typically this function is field (remote to office) based REQUIRED CORE COMPETENCIES / ATTRIBUTES - EXAMPLES REQUIRED MEDICAL KNOWLEDGE AREAS Adaptability Maintains effectiveness when experiencing major changes in work tasks or the work environment; adjusts effectively to work within new work structures, processes, requirements, or cultures. Considers change or new situations as opportunities for learning and growth. Perseveres when encountering adversity. When confronted with a problem or crisis, considers alternatives and then takes timely action. Effectively prioritizes work tasks. Initiative Takes prompt action to accomplish objectives; is proactive. Maintains a strong focus on internal and/or external customers. Continuously monitors relevant information, key issues and/or trends. Proactively seeks feedback and adapts behavior to improve performance. Demonstrates a willingness to learn new aspects of the business. Solid knowledge of pharmaceutical industry Knowledge of the scientific methods applied to clinical research and the current legislative/regulatory controls. Keen interest in developing and maintaining expert knowledge for assigned therapeutic area/product and in medical research in general REQUIRED PERSONAL / TECHNICAL SKILLS Innovation Generates innovative solutions in work situations; tries different and novel ways to deal with work problems and opportunities. Uses best practice and benchmark data to increase organizational performance. Identifies opportunities to improve efficiencies and red uce costs. Integrity Firmly adheres to codes of conduct and ethical principles. Exhibits honesty. Presents information accurately and completely. Keeps commitments to work colleagues and customers. Acknowledges and responds constructively to failure and mistakes. Team work / collaboration Works effectively and cooperatively with others; establishes and maintains good working relationships with internal and external partners to facilitate the accomplishment of work goals. Helps others achieve shared goals. Demonstrates a willingness to listen without interrupting. Open to diverse and different ideas. user: job description for the position of talent acquisition sourcer
jobdescription: Experience - 3 Years Designation - Talent Acquisition Sourcer Job Location - Bangalore Notice Period - 15 Days We are looking for an experienced Sourcer/Recruiter to join our Global Strategic Sourcing team. The Global Strategic Sourcing team works in partnership with the Recruiting teams to provide proactive and predictive recruiting services for HPE with a focus on developing pipelines of qualified talent and sourcing candidates with niche skill sets. Your role will be to proactively target and headhunt passive talent, for profiles which are not easily filled with traditional recruiting methods, and build talent pools of qualified candidates ready to be hired. Key responsibilities of the Sourcer include:  Providing specialized sourcing expertise for technical and niche profiles. This includes designing creative and innovative ways of finding passive external talent for HPE  Building and maintaining talent pools of suitably qualified candidates based on business demands  Consulting with hiring managers and recruiters to develop a strategic sourcing plan and ensure successful recruitment of quality candidates  Direct and proactive outreach to passive talent, including cold calling and headhunting  Fully qualifying the candidate during an initial telephone interview  Proactively using e-recruitment tools and Social Media to source top qualified candidates and keep up-to-date with new trends in sourcing  Staying present in the process and engaged with the candidate thought out the full recruitment lifecycle  Developing and maintaining effective networks to maximize visibility and attract top quality candidates.  Contributing to HPE's diversity objectives by developing a diverse top qualified pool of candidates (as applicable by geography) Support will be provided by the current team in order to build your knowledge of the organisation, systems and recruitment channels. Qualifications: E xperience  Substantial experience in a recruitment agency environment where you have been involved in directly sourcing, headhunting, cold calling and interviewing candidates  Demonstrated experience of managing hiring manager and stakeholder expectations  Experience of recruiting experienced IT professionals  First-level university degree or equivalent preferred  Experience of using social networking tools for recruitment e.g. LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter  Proven track record of delivering sufficient, high-quality pipelines for multiple complex searches simultaneously Skills  Competencies  Strong knowledge of recruitment and external market trends across India  Motivated team player with a passion for recruitment  Proficient at time management and organization with a strong sense of urgency, flexibility, and adaptability  Ability to effectively sell the HPE value proposition to candidates  Superior communication (written/verbal), presentation, and facilitation skills, with the ability to communicate effectively across all employee groups and levels (executives, managers  employees)  Persuasive and effective email and phone communication skills  Able to deal with ambiguity and changing landscapes  Creative mindset, able to think outside the box  Autonomous strategic thinker and change driver - makes things happen  Expert analytical  problem-solving skills  Ability to work in a collaborative manner and develop strong working relationships with clients, employees and HR colleagues. Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: Recruitment / Staffing Functional Area: HR , Recruitment , Administration , IR Role Category:HR/ Recruitment / IR Role:Recruitment Executive Keyskills Recruitment HR Talent Sourcing Talent Acquisition Head Hunting Hiring Cold Calling Social Networking Desired Candidate Profile  Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate Company Profile: Confidential Confidential Download PPT Photo 1  View Contact Details

Tech Mahindra is part of the US 15.4 billion Mahindra Group and is a leading global systems integrator and business transformation consulting organization, focused primarily on the telecommunications industry. Tech Mahindra helps companies innovate and transform by leveraging its unique insights, differentiated services and flexible partnering models. This has helped customers reduce operating costs, generate new revenue streams and gain competitive advantage. Tech Mahindra expanded its IT portfolio in 2009 by acquiring the leading global business and information technology services company, Mahindra Satyam (earlier known as Satyam Computer Services). Tech Mahindra's capabilities spread across a broad spectrum, including Business Support Systems (BSS), Operations Support Systems (OSS), Network Design  Engineering, Next Generation Networks, Mobility Solutions, Security consulting and Testing. Tech Mahindra's solutions portfolio includes Consulting, Application Development  Management, Network Services, Solution Integration, Product Engineering, Infrastructure Managed Services, Remote Infrastructure Management and BSG (comprises BPO, Services and Consulting). With an array of service offerings for TSPs, TEMs and ISVs, Tech Mahindra is a chosen transformation partner for several leading wireline, wireless and broadband operators in Europe, Asia-Pacific and North America. jobdescription: They are looking out for a lot of TEAM LEADER (VOICE PROCESS) with 4 to 9 years of EXPERIENCE out of which 1 year should be into team Leading. Dimension  Scope: This position is responsible for supporting; coaching; developing and supervising a group of employees in a Service Center/Operations environment. Principal Duties and Responsibilities: Monitor, identify and resolve performance/behavior/attendance issues using prescribed performance management techniques. Monitor and take action on TKS, personnel and payroll issues. Conduct performance appraisals annually. Review Companiess compliance documents as required. Responsible for staffing and hiring. Maintain current employee records on direct reports. Review CMS statistics on a daily basis and provide constructive feedback. Provide Subject Matter Expertise. Ensure training needs of subordinates are met. Modify Operations as needed to meet service level agreements under supervision of Operations Manager. Successfully complete all client related training. Resolve escalated customer issues. Hold team meetings on a regular basis with direct reports. Communicate all process and client changes to direct reports within specific timeliness Promote the use of all center communication tools. Responsible for day-to-day functional supervision of non-exempt work group, including work assignment and attendance monitoring; providing input into selecting, training, developing, and completing performance appraisal of work group(s) in accordance with the organizations policies and applicable legal requirements. Education  Professional Certifications: Associates degree in related field or advanced vocational training with two to four years related experience; or Bachelors degree or equivalent with three or more years of related work experience. Candidate Profile: Candidate should be an existing team leader for at least 1 year. Should have exhaustive experience in driving customer satisfaction related deliverables Experience in telecom industry preferable. Current team size should be minimum 15 associates. Ability to guide individuals toward goal achievement using negotiation, teamwork / collaboration, motivation and staff development skills including the ability to act as a role model within the organization. Ability to demonstrate innovation and good judgment / problem solving skills when making decisions. Ability to establish a course of action for self and others to accomplish a specific goal while using appropriate resources. Ability to coach, develops action plans, which maximize performance and provide effective feedback. Proven ability to analyze and improve work processes and policies Excellent customer service / support skills, ability to work well under pressure, professional demeanor and strong written and oral communication skills. Must have proficiency with various software applications programs including Lotus Notes, Microsoft Word, and Excel. Interacting with clients through e-mails and daily Conference Calls to review and resolve operational issues as well as implementing new process  procedure changes. Conceiving/implementing short/long-term business plans for achievement of organizational financial objectives. THE POSITION WOULD BE BASED IN MUMBAI / BANGALORE / GURGAON AND THE SALARY WOULD BE THE BEST IN THE INDUSTRY. user: job description for the position of job opening for undergraduate freshers in bpo voice process
jobdescription: Are you an undergraduate looking for job and couldnt get anywhere and looking for ways to start your career, why dont you try in BPO? Shift and off: UK shift/Night shift; 2 way cabs available Job location: Ecospace, belandur/Bommanahalli/Brookfield Type : International voice process/Domestic voice process Salary: 2.5 LPA-4 LPA Why to start career in BPO? BPO has always been a career choice which gives you an opportunity to grow and develop your personality and communication skills. The recent survey also tells the fast growth of this industry Your skills to become globally competitive. BPO is the most stable and fast growing industry nowadays despite the global economic crisis. Great career opportunities await qualified individuals who will join the industry. Working in a call center will also help you develop your communication skills Your grade of pay in voice processing industry: Your salary would depend on the company at which you are working. Salaries also depend of the nature of call centers and shifts. As a fresher you can start from 10000/- or more and when you become managers then you draw more than 30,000/- per month. After this you also get perks and other benefits as well. Requisites Education is not a matter of concern if you have excellent fluency in English Flexible to work in shifts Willing to work in voice process Job roles and responsibilities: Voice Process: As it suggests, you need to talk to customers and get things done. Voice jobs pay more compared to non voice. The main activity in a call center is to handle the customers queries effectively and satisfactory. Also to co-ordinate well in a team in order to offer the best service possible to the customer. Career opportunity in Voice processing can be best describes as the ways in which customers can get their complaints and grievances answered and fixed with the help of the voice processors. It is a technical term that needs some kind of an interaction between the callers and the called. They have been given many terms as well. You can also be known as a customer support and many such names just to mention a few. There are other job profiles as well in the same stream. It depends on the agency for which you are working and the type of job which you have grabbed. Career prospects of a voice processor: It has been see that the ones who would want to go for a career in this line never fail. You have ample options and companies to join. There are different sections of a call center where you can work and earn money. You can also start your own call center when you are well experienced. Never forget to have a taste of each and every section in a voice processing industry so that you can get into any section whenever you would want. There are no scarcities of job in this sector. You can also set up other establishments or work somewhere during the daytime and work at call centers as a part time employee at night. jobdescription: Job Title : RD Engineer Department : Research and Development Education : Bachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent Location : Bangalore (ITPL, Whitefield) Overview: In the RD world, speed and quality are sometimes two competing factors. On the one hand, there is the sprint to delivery and on the other hand, there is the standard of excellence. Our Developers balance the need for speed and functionality with their commitment to quality. We seek RD engineers who can shape the future of infrastructure management. Responsibilities: We are looking for hands-on developers ready to work with scientists tackling the big challenges in deep language understanding. With an extensive existing customer base and a market-leading position in help desk automation, your work will go into production as soon as it shows measurable improvement over current methods. We think long term, while putting our research into practice on a rational schedule. You are passionate about good code and know how to make it a reality - how to fight for quality and sprint to delivery, managing the need for speed and functionality and the commitment to quality. You know how to use the latest tools and frameworks, not just because they're new, but because they help get the job done. You know how to lead and mention junior engineers and follow and deliver results for managers on predictable schedules. Work with other members of RD, Systems, Applications, and Networking to design and build infrastructure management systems. Write clean, scalable, documented code and unit tests. To work on SQL/MYsql is a must. Continuously research new technologies, frameworks, and libraries. "Own" applications, features, and any associated bugs or performance problems. Tune and enhance 3rd party systems to meet requirements in any language. Help build a professional software development infrastructure. Bug tracking, version control, branching strategies, continuous integration, etc. Analyze and distill requirements into actionable development tasks. You should be comfortable defining delivery schedules and metrics for performance assessment and meeting your targets. Qualifications: First and foremost we need great code and great coders. A great coder should be able to learn a new framework quickly, so experience with each of the items below just helps us understand your experience, but each is desirable Java Spring, Guava, JDBC, Tomcat, JUnit Development tools such as Maven, Jenkins, Ant, Eclipse Expertise in building highly scalable, fault tolerant, distributed systems. Exceptional Java development skills and familiarity with open source libraries and their integration is required. Experience integrating multiple open source libraries and frameworks into working systems. Linux experience as a primary development operating system. Debugging and performance tuning of complex, multi-tier applications. Database design experience: JMS, JSP, Servlets, JDBC Spring Framework ORM libraries (Hibernate or Toplink) Application server experience SQL and data model design XML schema design, XSLT, Xpath Internet related protocols: TCP/IP, SSL, HTTP, etc. Jakarta commons Eclipse or other modern IDE. Version control systems. Perl Over 5 years core Java (server-side) development experience, experience with 1.5 features. The candidates must be a self-starter Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. Personal specifications: Possesses good analytical  troubleshooting skills Flexible attitude and can do attitude Drives improvements and process innovation Familiar with Cognitive technologies Salary:INR 9,00,000 - 19,00,000 P.A Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - System Programming Role Category:Programming  Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills java core java JSP Servlets JDBC JMS Sprint MVC Shell scripting MySQL ActiveMQ php Spring Web Services Http Logical question Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Any Specialization PG:Post Graduation Not Required Company Profile: IPsoft Global Services Private Limited ABOUT IPSOFT IPsoft is a global, industry-leading managed services company offering a complete solution to enterprise customers for outsourcing global IT operations. We offer a full range of managed services to our clients, from management at the individual component, device and network level to the analysis, design and management of complex business processes. IPsoft's unique (and proprietary) automation technology remediates more than half of the detected exceptions in our managed client environments. We manage our customers' systems through our worldwide Network Operations Centers located in New York City (HQ), London, Amsterdam and Bangalore. user: job description for the position of senior code vulnerability engineer
jobdescription: We have an urgent requirement for the post of Sr. Code Vulnerability Engineer with one of our client in Bangalore Position:Sr. Code Vulnerability Engineer. Mode : Permanent Exp : 8yrs Location:Bangalore NP : Max 30Days General Description and Responsibilities Senior Code Vulnerability Engineer will play a critical role in code security and secure software development life cycle. It will encompass a broad range of information security controls to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of enterprise data stored on a variety of vendor database solutions. The job is composed of tactical, operational and strategic functions and responsibilities. Responsibilities Include: Conducted static and dynamic analysis on a variety of code bases and platforms. Conduct Information Security assessments / penetration tests, as an individual, self-managed tester, or in small project teams. Discover security vulnerabilities in web and mobile applications and provide recommended remediation steps to developers. Apply industry best practices for vulnerability and threat management. Document findings for management and technical staff and recommend mitigating actions. user: job description for the position of manager smart controls
jobdescription: THE ROLE: We are currently seeking an experienced professional at a Manager level within IT Advisory (ITAS) for our KPMG Risk Consulting practice to join us in our Bangalore office. A Manager would typically be responsible for delivering specific IT Internal Audit and IT Risk assessment work, managing teams and managing quality of work. It includes establishing themselves as a subject matter expert in one or more chosen field of expertise, and delivering high quality work. Responsibilities: Responsible as team lead for performing a comprehensive program of compliance monitoring services in IT SOx 404 Audits, IT Internal Audit, business process/application controls testing and PCI DSS (payment certifications) in Financial Services Responsible for delivery and management of all testing of ITGCCs and application/business controls as it relates to SOX controls testing lifecycle. Responsible for seeing that all activities are performed in accordance with the agreed delivery timeline of controls testing and any escalations are properly communicated. Support in annual and quarterly plan for controls testing and communication of dependencies to the client. Coordinate with client for on-going observations, escalations to ensure minimum impact to actual delivery and all to ensure risks to delivery are communicated properly. Perform special assignments of a complex and/or sensitive nature as directed by the Quality lead and/or Operations lead as requested by client when necessary. Perform 100 detailed review of all steps of testing by team members and documentation to ensure minimum quality rejects. Perform a continuous quality improvement exercise to implement lessons learned of previous quarter rejects to make sure no repeats. user: job description for the position of process jobs in leading company for it help desktechnical support
jobdescription: IT help desk/Technical support/Service desk in leading company Are you looking to make your career in Technical support or IT help desk /service desk in leading company? Freshers also can apply! Importance of Technical support/IT help desk The information technology world has created exciting opportunities for anyone seeking a job in the technical world. Of those many jobs, the technical support position offers several advantages. Technical support personnel are typically among the brightest technical professionals , and must be ready to support other technology people, such as programmers, operators and hardware engineers. Technical support skills are totally portable from one company to another. A technical support specialist can take her knowledge with her to a new job and never miss a beat. Job location: Bangalore Salary: 2.5LPA-6 LPA (Depends upon relevant experience and education qualification) Shifts: Day shift/UK/US/ Australian/rotational shifts Cabs provided: 2 way Type : International voice process/Domestic voice process Eligibility: Graduate (Fresher/experienced) Under Graduate(Fresher/experienced) Type: International voice process/Domestic voice process Job summary Technical support and IT help desk executive will apply technical knowledge executive will apply technical knowledge related to computer hardware, software or network problem and providing resolution to end-users by performing a question diagnosis. What does an IT technical support officer do? As an IT help desk, you will be part of the IT crowd so you will be monitoring and maintaining the computer systems as well as the networks within an organization. You will be the first person employees will come to. Career progression and opportunities why career in technical support? Technical support is vital to the ongoing operational efficiency of the company. Supporting the rest of the business with their ongoing IT requirements, the sky is the limit. Being promoted to a more senior technical support role and from there to a team, section or department leader. Technical support can provide useful experience for other jobs Entry requirements One who insist to make career in technical field The computing world evolves very quickly and new technologies are always being developed so it is more important that candidates keep IT knowledge up to date. Typical work activities IT technical support officers are mainly responsible for the smooth running of computer systems and ensuring users get maximum benefits from them. Installing and configuring computer hardware operating systems and applications; Talking staff or clients through a series of actions over the telephone to help set up systems or resolve issues Testing and evaluating new technology; Stay current with system information, changes and updates Diagnose and resolve technical hardware and software issues involving internet connectivity, email clients, IPTV, VOIP and more; Skills and knowledge Knowledge of customer service principles and practices; Effective listening skills; Multi-tasking capabilities; Problem Solving, Verbal Communication, telephone etiquettes, Customer Service, PC Proficiency Competencies Possesses, acquires, and maintains the technical/professional expertise required to do the job effectively and to create effective customer solutions Sets high standards of performance for self; Assuming responsibility and accountability for successfully completing assignments or tasks; Self-imposing standards of excellence rather than having standards imposed. If you're... A logical thinker with excellent problem-solving skills , excellent communication skills and who like to keep up to date with the latest technology then you may be the perfect candidate for working in technical support. jobdescription: "Overview Jivox enables the worlds top advertisers and agencies to deliver personalized advertising across all screens. Our flagship product, Jivox IQ, is the leading data-driven dynamic ad platform. Its unique architecture enables customers to develop and serve data-driven dynamic ads in a wide variety of formats, including mobile, interactive, expanding, video, native and much more. Several hundred media companies and agencies today use Jivox for their most demanding creative campaigns, including College Humor, Crispin Porter  Bogusky, Federated Media, Digitas, Havas, Hearst, AE Networks, Martini Media, Merkley  Partners, Razorfish, TVGla, Universal McCann, Videology and WiedenKennedy. Stop by our Ad Gallery at http://www.jivox.com to see our ads at work. Position - Senior AdOps Technical Analyst This position requires an individual with good at Campaign Management - Adops, performance driven, effective communication skills. Also, possesses a good understanding of project/time management skills. Responsibilities This position leads our Global Creative and Design team. The Jivox IQ platform allows our agency and publisher clients to deliver dynamic, rich, multi-screen advertising experiences, and your role will be to ensure that our creative meets the highest quality standards. Core responsibilities include concepting new campaigns in the pre-sales process, executing designs for campaigns in production and ensuring design quality across all aspects of delivery. Youll need a keen eye for fresh and innovative design, as well as strong attention to detail. In this role, youll get to work with some of the most famous US and international brands, as well as top agencies and publishers. Day to day responsibilities include: Managing design quality across all campaigns delivered by the Jivox Client Services team. Work with the sales team to concept advertising for major US brands, to be included in sales/marketing pitches. Design ad units for campaigns executed by the Jivox Client Services team. Work with the Jivox global design and creative team to define, maintain and monitor quality standards. Assist in building a global design team to provide scalable design support across multiple time zones, geographies and advertising markets. Design and execute animations for design concepts as well as live campaigns. Assist in the design of Jivox Corporation branding, marketing and sales materials, including Jivox.com. jobdescription: HR Technology Application Developer Human Resource Technology (HRT) is the central steward for the design, build, and asset management for the firm's Human Capital technology across all lines of business and global regions. HRT provides technology support for staffing and on-boarding, employee records, payroll, talent management, compensation, benefits, learning, employee and manager service, workforce planning and analytics, and back office call center operations. The HR Technology Platform  Planning Systems currently manages a diverse portfolio which includes next generation analytics, legacy planning tools, as well as the firms data warehouse related to our best in class workers. user: job description for the position of data scientist partners for start up
jobdescription: We are a start-up with an ambition to bring a disruption in analytics industry. We intend to make available the pre-built industry specific analytics models on-demand to any size of the organization. We leverage an open source machine learning platform that unifies in-memory big data, data pipeline, machine learning and big data APIs. As we focus on industry solution, we look forward one partner per industry . For the time being, our industry focus is limited to Energy (including renewable), Utilities, Telecom  Industrial Products . We don't demand full-time involvement as long as you support the schedule  plan. Unless you have the urge to do something bigger, you are not fit for this. Compensation for this role will be purely equity based. Salary or other monetary compensation will be considered upon revenue generation or a significant funding event, but is not currently available. You will work with founders and would shine on the top-line leadership. Though not limited, the job description is as given below: 1. Work in a multi-disciplined team where you will take full ownership of turning discoveries and ideas into machine learning models for your allocated industry 2. It is expected you already bring up 5 to 10 analytics model aligned to your industry which can be leveraged immediately 3. Should have very strong hands-on exposure into Machine Learning, Analytics, Big Data, Java, Python, R, Spark  Hadoop etc. 4. Should be able to develop model with quickest turn-around time given the requirement 5. Must have 5 years of hands-on experience on machine learning and should be doing designing and coding now 6. Must have good exposure around the Industry segments 7. Should have the interest to learn new technology and do experiment 8. Should be able to collaborate with customer in identifying the requirement and developing the solution quickly 9. Must be a good trainer to enable junior resource to come up to speed quickly 10. Should be a good team player We are a performance based company and we will evaluate performance each quarter. While applying, please mention the industry you should be considered for. We work on virtually, right candidate from any part of India or abroad is welcome.
